# Pull Request Checklist

- [ ] **Architecture Compliance**: Does this PR respect Clean Architecture layers? (Domain -> Application -> Adapters)
- [ ] **Tests**: Did you add/update unit tests? (`tests/`)
- [ ] **Documentation**:
    - [ ] Updated `_docs/_CHANGELOG/`.
    - [ ] Updated Semantic Docs (`_docs/_MCP_SERVER`, `_docs/_ADDON`).
- [ ] **Type Hints**: Are all functions typed?

## Description
Briefly describe the changes and the rationale.

## Related Issue/Task
Link to the Task ID (e.g., TASK-004).
